item.title: Everything Programmers need to learn about GPT — Using OpenAI and Understanding Prompting
item.description: ChatGPT’s free conversational interface offers a tantalizing glimpse into the future of AI. But the full potential of generative models lies in integration with real-world systems.

item.title: Everything you need to learn about GPT — How Does ChatGPT Work?
item.description: ChatGPT is what everyone is talking about nowadays. Would it take all the jobs? Or would it result in misinformation on the web? There are just so many posts and articles that fill my inbox daily when it comes to GPTs. Add to that so many versions of GPTs and tools to use these GPTs; it is getting increasingly frustrating to keep track of everything in the GPT Landscape.
